data.name: Military Academy
data.description:
Increase the production speed of infantry, cavalry, siege, and transport units at buildings by 33%.
Does not affect religious units or other support units.

Increase the production speed of infantry, cavalry, siege, and transport units at buildings by 33%.

该效果不适用于宗教单位或其他辅助单位。

data.name: Mounted Training
data.description:
Increase weapon range of Horse Archers by +1 and unlock the Gallop ability.
Gallop: Activate to move at maximum speed with +2 tile weapon range for 8 seconds.

variations.description:
Increase weapon range of Horse Archers by +1 and unlock the Gallop ability.
Gallop: Activate to move at maximum speed with +2 tile weapon range for 8 seconds.
variations.descriptionCN:
增加骑射手的武器射程 +1 并解锁疾驰技能。
疾驰：激活后，以最大速度移动，以及武器攻击范围增加 +2 格，持续 8 秒。

data.name: Professional Scouts
data.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -55% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar. Deer slowly decay while being carried.

variations.name: Professional Scouts
variations.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -55% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar. Deer slowly decay while being carried.
variations.descriptionCN:
侦察兵获得携带动物尸骸的能力，且对野生动物造成的伤害 +100%。
侦察兵在携带动物尸骸时移动速度 -55%，且无法拾取野猪尸骸。若携带的是鹿尸骸，则会缓慢腐烂。
